bilingual.source: It's a new stage of your study.
May be presented in paragraphs, with each stage explained in a separate paragraph.
bilingual.target: 可以分段呈现，每个阶段在单独的段落中解释。

bilingual.source: May be presented as a flow chart, with each stage explained in a separate box.
bilingual.target: 可以以流程图形式呈现，每个阶段在单独的框中解释。

bilingual.source: The project is in its initial stage.
The butterfly is in its pupal stage.
Each stage of the process is crucial.
bilingual.target: 每个流程的阶段都很关键。

bilingual.source: Learning at the primary stage is important.
bilingual.target: 初级阶段的学习很重要。

bilingual.source: The project is still in an embryonic stage.
bilingual.target: 这个项目仍处于初期阶段。

bilingual.source: This sculpture is still in the roughcast stage.
bilingual.target: 这个雕塑还在毛坯阶段。

bilingual.source: At this stage, you need more practice.
bilingual.target: 在这个阶段，你需要更多的练习。

list.abstract: stage，全名为Stage Hyaline of World，是一个中国潮流时尚服饰品牌，于2006年由罗志祥创立。 stage不断以创新、突破的原创理念，注入潮流时尚设计，致力于打造有突破性和创新性的潮牌服饰，旗下服饰都以原创为主，更是与国际品牌合作，创造出了很多国际性的原创服装。 先后在中国台湾、中国香港、上海、南京、新加坡开设分店。
stage，英文单词，名词、及物动词、不及物动词，作名词时意为“阶段；舞台；戏剧；驿站，人名；(英)斯特奇”，作及物动词时意为“举行；上演；筹划”，作不及物动词时意为“举行；适于上演；乘驿车旅行”。

yingyinNormal.en: Sir? Yes? And what would be the next stage?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不好意思。请说。下一个阶段呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I went through that stage and now I'm going through the stage of missing the game.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我已经熬过那个时期了，现在我正在经历想念赛场的阶段。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: Stage two of training is where you are most at risk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第二阶段的训练是你最危险的时期。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, the next stage would probably be control of other people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下一阶段可能是控制他人。

yingyinNormal.en: This first stage would give us access to and control over our own body.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这第一阶段，我们可以尽情发挥并控制自己的身体。

yingyinNormal.en: At the end of each stage of training, the lowestranking initiates will be leaving us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 训练的每个阶段，排名倒数的新生们将会离开无畏派。

yingyinNormal.en: My brother was like you. During the second stage, he got good really fast.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我弟弟和你一样，在第二阶段训练的时候，他很快就能逃出来。

yingyinNormal.en: We already are. We're the next stage of human evolution. You said it yourself!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们已经是了。我们是人类进化的下一阶段，你自己也这么说！

yingyinNormal.en: Alrighty. We're gonna start with some basic third stage breathing exercises, so Mummies, why don't you get on your back?
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先是第三阶段基本呼吸练习，各位妈妈请躺下。

yingyinNormal.en: Honey, how are you feeling? The book says at this stage of the pregnancy morning sickness should be going away. So that's good news, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的，你还好吗？书上说怀孕到了这个阶段，晨吐的症状应该会没了。这算好消息吧？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm now at a stage in my own life in which it is much more important to me to pass along what I've learned about how to be successful than to seek more success for myself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我现在的生活阶段对我更重要的是，将我所学到的成功的知识传递下去，而不是自己追寻成功。

yingyinNormal.en: Ted Hendricks. Managing director of the transition. Never fun, this stage. But we do have ahead of us the privilege of publishing what will be the very last issue of LIFE magazine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 泰德·亨德里克斯，过渡期主任。这个阶段一点都不有趣，现今我们最重要的一件事，就是我们最后一期的生活周刊特辑。

yingyinNormal.en: So this is your real stage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喔，这是你真正的舞台。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you know where you will stage this festivity?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想在哪里举办呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Beijing is an important player on the global stage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 北京是国际舞台上一个重要的选手。

yingyinNormal.en: Bring a bottle of water on stage if you're allowed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果可以的话，带一瓶水上台。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: Get your stick and get your fucking ass on the stage. On stage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拿好槌子滚上台。去上台。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, if he's center stage on this, he can't fault my performance, because we're sharing the stage together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他在这个舞台的中央，他就不能挑我的刺，因为我们要共享这个舞台。

yingyinNormal.en: Now get your stick and get your ass on the stage. I can't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拿好鼓槌滚上台去。我不行。

yingyinNormal.en: I assume you're going to give me an explanation at some stage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他也可以这么说你。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Be diligent at each educational <highlight>stage</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在每个教育阶段都要勤奋。

examination_example.sentence: Although only a research project at this <highlight>stage</highlight>, the request has raised the prospect of regulators wading into early-<highlight>stage</highlight> tech markets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管现阶段这只是一个研究项目，但这一请求引发了监管机构介入早期科技市场的可能性。

examination_example.sentence: It was only after "toddler" became a common shoppers' term that it evolved into a broadly accepted developmental <highlight>stage</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到“幼童”这个词常常为顾客所用，它才逐渐变成被人们广泛接受的一个成长阶段。

sense_info_list.en: a place where something important happens

examination_example.sentence: Marlowe had brought poetry and genius to triumph on the common <highlight>stage</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 马洛让诗歌和创造力在普通舞台上大放异彩。

examination_example.sentence: For a time literature showed no interest in this public <highlight>stage</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一段时间，文学对这个公共舞台不感兴趣。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 阶段；时期；步骤；舞台；层；楼层；塔层；与某时代对应的一段地层；戏剧

examination_example.sentence: The trick, then, is to reach the third <highlight>stage</highlight> sooner by focusing earlier and more closely on fatal accidents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，诀窍就是通过更早，更密切地关注致命事故，更早地进入第三阶段。

examination_example.sentence: What does the speaker say about entrepreneurs at the initial <highlight>stage</highlight> of a new venture?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于创业初期的创业者，演讲者说了些什么？

examination_example.sentence: At 43, I've reached the <highlight>stage</highlight> where women are warned to watch out for the creeping sadness of middle age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 43岁时，我已经到了这样一个阶段:女性被警告要警惕中年时期逐渐蔓延的悲伤情绪。

sense_info_list.en: a place where something important happens

examination_example.sentence: This way new idols have been brought to the <highlight>stage</highlight>: politicians, celebrities, and other big names.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过这种方式，新的偶像被带到了舞台上：政客、名人和其他名人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: A three <highlight>stage</highlight> life has few transitions, while a multi-<highlight>stage</highlight> life has many.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 三个阶段的人生几乎没有过渡，而多阶段的人生却有很多过渡。

examination_example.sentence: It's still in its early <highlight>stages</highlight>, but I think it's shifting around not what kids learn but how they learn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种转变还处于初级阶段，但我认为它改变的不是孩子们学什么，而是怎么学。

examination_example.sentence: At this <highlight>stage</highlight>, it would be better if you approached him directly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这个时候，你最好直接联系他。

sense_info_list.en: a place where something important happens

examination_example.sentence: He walked across the <highlight>stage</highlight> as the audience cheered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在观众的欢呼声中走过舞台。

舞台剧演员；舞台演艺人员；演员

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 阶段；时期；步骤；舞台；层；楼层；塔层；与某时代对应的一段地层；戏剧

word_family.mean: n. 雄鹿；成年牡鹿；认购新股后即转手出售以图谋利者；打新股的人；雄火鸡；只限男子参加的社交聚会；不带异性同伴参加聚会者

examination_example.sentence: He said he became just as nervous as those playing instruments on <highlight>stage</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说他变得和台上演奏乐器的人一样紧张。

examination_example.sentence: I'm worried I'll get nervous and freeze on <highlight>stage</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我担心我会在舞台上紧张得僵住。

examination_example.sentence: I was a born performer who preferred the theatrical, even when off <highlight>stage</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我是一个天生的表演者，喜欢戏剧，即使是在舞台之外。

examination_example.sentence: Pictures used in the two <highlight>stages</highlight> were different.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两个阶段使用的图片不同。

examination_example.sentence: During the training <highlight>stage</highlight>, each dog was shown only the upper half or the lower half of the person's face.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在训练阶段，每只狗只看到人的上半张脸或下半张脸。

examination_example.sentence: The study showed the animals had figured out how to apply what they learned about human faces in the testing <highlight>stage</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究表明，动物们已经学会了如何在测试阶段应用他们所学到的关于人脸的知识。

sense_info_list.zh: (set the stage for)为某事铺平了道路

examination_example.sentence: While high school does not generally encourage students to explore new aspects of life, college sets the <highlight>stage</highlight> for that exploration.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然高中一般不鼓励学生探索生活的新方面，但大学为这种探索创造了条件。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I went up to the <highlight>stage</highlight> and read my essay “My Father's Son.”
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我走到台上，读了我的文章《我父亲的儿子》。

examination_example.sentence: He had never acted on <highlight>stage</highlight> before and he was very excited.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他非常兴奋，他之前从未在舞台上演过戏。

examination_example.sentence: It has one opera singer on <highlight>stage</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 舞台上有一位歌剧演员。

examination_example.sentence: At the early <highlight>stage</highlight>, it is called a baby cicada.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在早期阶段，它被称为小蝉。

examination_example.sentence: Puberty(青春期) is the <highlight>stage</highlight> of life when young people leave childhood and head into adulthood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 青春期是年轻人离开童年，走向成年的人生阶段。

examination_example.sentence: Teenage boys at this <highlight>stage</highlight> often begin to take unnecessary risks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这个阶段的青少年男孩往往开始承担不必要的风险。
